Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the involvement of Black Lives Matter members in the incident, falsely connecting it to a racial dispute involving the movement.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the incident had nothing to do with the Black Lives Matter movement or any form of racial protest.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the media "censored" the story. The incident was reported on by news media at the time.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the media intentionally suppressed the story, without providing evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the incident was a result of an altercation between co-workers, rather than a targeted attack by Black Lives Matter members.
